Case# SMPTETimeType.type24

iOS 2.0+iPadOS 2.0+macOS 10.0+tvOS 9.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 3.0+

```
case type24
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/CoreAudioTypes/SMPTETimeType/type24#Discussion)

24 video frames per second—standard for 16mm and 35mm film.
